function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in a meat-processing plant due to poor ventilation and crowded environment.","Impact":"Large number of secondary infections, potential for widespread outbreak.","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, wearing masks, and installing filtering devices.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filters, UV germicidal irradiation.","People":"Workers at the meat-processing plant, visitors, local community.","Owner":"Plant management, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Spread of SARS-CoV-2 through the air at a distance of 2m or more in a confined and crowded environment.","Impact":"Risk of large number of secondary infections.","Mitigation":"Implementing improved ventilation and airflow, wearing masks.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filters, mask-wearing.","People":"Workers, visitors, local community.","Owner":"Management, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Control of infectious aerosols by ventilation, filtration, and UV germicidal irradiation.","Impact":"Reduction of the risk of aerosol transmission of SARS-CoV-2.","Mitigation":"Implementation of ventilation systems, air filters, and UV germicidal irradiation.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filters, UV germicidal irradiation.","People":"Workers, visitors, local community.","Owner":"Plant management, public health authorities."}]}
